Reviews.Content: chose hotel central location reasonable price counts hotel matched expectations looking fivestar luxury inclusive breakfast meagre bonus expect clean comfortable refurbished advertised restaurant bar advertised lights promised toiletries minibar hairdryer plus prepared booked receptionist told towels available following morning guess usually designated casual staff latenight drunks bad laughed choice free managerowner available write name dust windowsill failed loo paper locked dispenser froze unheated bathshower separate toilet ventilation uncovered hole wall leading outside simply refurbishment public clean redecoration linen threadbare hotel amenities advertised website simply excuse hotel city amsterdam provide quality accommodation value money cheapest backpacker hostels ripping tourists unable arrive town dont reward hotelier putting money pocket

Reviews.Title: “Value = you get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: WorldwideWebster
Reviews.Content: detractors 23 star hotel 23 star price pay staff friendly breakfast adequate location excellent nice quiet backwater walkable taxi station pricey ripped oneway system makes bit circular tour summary depends crap complain moved 10 fine example remember aint paying ritz view boutique ambiance recommend short stay

Reviews.Title: “very well run reasonable hotel”
Reviews.Author: pooroldpom
Reviews.Content: traveling grandchildren found hotel clean staffed contact placed shopping food views hotel canals stunning found amount steps enter hotel foyer otherwise enjoyable stay

Reviews.Title: “Amazing location, horrible room”
Reviews.Author: allneonlike
Reviews.Content: location hotel excellent canal easily walk amsterdams sights reviews lobby bar false idea unpleasant cleanliness freezing heating whatsoever walls paper thin light sleepers seek elsewhere staff bit clueless tried charge twice rude looked records insistence apologetic plus apart location shower hot time breakfast unexciting perfectly fine cleaning staff job am concerned relatively cheap price recommend steer unless tolerate cold depressing

Reviews.Content: dreadful hotel wouldnt recommend enemy 8 3rd floor tiny dirty bathroom cramped sitting toilet easily washed hands sink lap washed hair shower bearing mind travelled november weather cold wet supplied sheet single double bed described curtains sleep pillows extremely lumpy reception following night told couldnt spares offered towels instead website offered cable tv couldnt understand ours wouldnt help reception told honest none televisions building owner paid cable bill straw prompted leave 2 nights visitor night ate food lending 2nd night sleep looking entry holes found lived mouse hole floorboards upside location spirits experiencing grotty hotel

Reviews.Author: Evelaw
Reviews.Content: hotel condition desperate disgusting condition disappointed checkin hotel website photos feature close expect probably 2 condition feature website rest simply horrible walking towards hotel lobby doesnâ€™t bad soon proceed climb flights extremely steep narrow stairs dingy dusty bed infected bugs bathroom toilet grubby wall tiles separate dirty shower curtain view window shaft bottom shaft lots garbage 2 raining nights rain falling noise kept partner awake night positive aspect probably location recommended

Reviews.Title: “Beware”
Reviews.Author: FrankandJane_30
Reviews.Content: location nice staff absolute dump hasnt seen maintenance decades paint peeling wallpaper torn tattered carpet worn torn patched damp ceiling shower falling apart leaking water bathroom stunk bed covering worn stained seasoned travelers expect european hotels arent fussy cringe worst weve encountered unless youre inebriated couple guys whos option sleeping bench canal suggest look elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “This hotel was terrible”
Reviews.Author: leehannah
Reviews.Content: hotel terrible toilet stank stale urine waited hours towels didnt fresh weekend 24 hour bar 2 lager night bed springs sticking matress night porn movie noise terrible walls paper thin top door wouldnt lock move partner eventually managed agree free bar refused money location close attractions

Reviews.Title: “Resonable basic hotel, but beware the basement!”
Reviews.Author: mike21683
Reviews.Content: hotel isnt nearly bad reviews perfectly fine basic hotel location fantastic walk 10 minutes staff friendly adequate bathroom facilities sleep arent expecting 5 luxury fine especially price arrived guy desk told due overbooking automatic bookings system 4 2 person available offered basement 2 looked mattress ground windows bathroom facilities instead bedding floor 2 person cram night 3 nights moved 4 person annoying discount inconvenience 2 alternative possibly sleep horrible basement guy desk happened time major seen mention basement recommend contacting hotel directly booking 3rd party ensure doesnt happen

Reviews.Title: “Picturesque on the outside, dissapointing on the inside!”
Reviews.Author: bibs74
Reviews.Content: arrival rembrandtplein hotel amsterdam wlk lovely cobbled street bridges canal appearance hotel looked lovely welcoming pleased choice reception greeted owner nice keys towards stairs 14 nice experience didnt tell whilst carrying heavy bag 14 infact 5th floor 6 story hotel stairs steep winding difficult lugguage etc finally arrived 5th floor towards drawn marker arrow missing belive paid money peeling wall paper tolietries extremely bathroom toilet near shower divided curtain carpet ran describe box mattress top carpet reach radiator carpet filthy heavily stained looked hadnt months layer mold bathroom door extractor fan steam electrical wire sticking assume hotel 100 yards raddison close main town literally worlds apart hotel awarded 2 star wasnt worthy stayed bs blackpool thats saying wouldnt advise hotel likes cleanliness shape form couple pluss night receptionist friendly welcoming happy help returned continental breakfast simple adequate maps leaflets reception help moral stay hotel avoid horrendous stair climbing drunk try forget staying recommended

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel, helpful staff, will definitely be staying there again!”
Reviews.Author: deeeevo_13
Reviews.Content: travelled amsterdam late january girlfriend stayed hotel finding lastminutecom cheaper price hostels charging wasnt overly special werent amsterdam spend day night hotel staff friendly happy swap family sized extra charge view canal front pretty basic clean sheets television decent shower decent nights sleep bar downstairs 24hrs hand help bit annoying hand keys time outside ducking quick smoke bit tedious youre luxurious hotel dont youre clean basic friendly staff recommend hesitation negative reviews people expecting 5 star hotel
